ComicInfo.Series: Van Helsing: Return of The League of Monsters
ComicInfo.Summary:
32-page story!
VAN HELSING TEAMS UP WITH HER GREATEST ENEMIES!
Liesel Van Helsing has lost everything, and now she must go through Hell to get it back… literally. After the shocking events of Van Helsing’s last encounter with the League of Monsters, the famed vampire hunter finds herself in a horrific situation: she must join forces with her most vicious enemies in order to save someone important to her. In this climactic issue, Van Helsing descends into the Greek Underworld and faces off with an entity claiming to be her long lost love: Hades, God of the Underworld.
ComicInfo.Title: Return of The League of Monsters, Part 2 of 2
ComicInfo.Writer: Pat Shand,Joe Brusha,Ralph Tedesco,Dave Franchini,David Wohl,Pat Shand,Joe Brusha,Ralph Tedesco,Dave Franchini,David Wohl
